This repository provides a command-line interface (CLI) tool for AI agents to control the Chrome browser. It offers fast and token-efficient control over browser actions like navigation, interaction, and content extraction, aiming to be significantly faster than existing solutions.

SourceGit is an open-source, cross-platform GUI client for Git, designed to provide a user-friendly interface for managing Git repositories on Windows, macOS, and Linux. It offers a wide range of Git commands through a visual interface, supports customization, and includes advanced features like GitFlow, Git LFS, and AI-assisted commit message generation.

CompressO is a cross-platform desktop application built with Tauri and Rust that allows users to significantly reduce video file sizes. It leverages FFmpeg for powerful compression and works entirely offline, ensuring user privacy and security.

Pyversity is a Python library designed to enhance search and retrieval systems by diversifying their results. It efficiently re-ranks lists of similar items to reduce redundancy and surface a wider range of relevant content.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Skyvern is a Python-based tool that automates browser-based workflows using Large Language Models (LLMs) and computer vision. It offers a simple API to replace brittle automation solutions by enabling agents to understand and interact with websites visually, making them resilient to layout changes and capable of handling unseen websites.

Sampler is a Go-based command-line tool that executes shell commands at specified intervals, visualizing their output in real-time through various terminal-based charts and providing alerting capabilities. It's designed as a lightweight alternative to complex monitoring systems for development and quick metric observation.
